overview: live Blu Ray from the Folk/Soul performer Ayo, born to a Nigerian father and gypsy mother in Germany. Her break-through album Joyful, brought Ayo to the attention of European music fans and this disk features her performing songs from this magnificent album and more. 13 tracks including 'Letter By Letter', 'Help Is Coming', 'And It's Supposed To Be Love' and more.
title: Ayo: Live at Olympia
